question: Now I'm going to read a list of political leaders.  For each, tell me how much confidence you have in each leader to do the right thing regarding world affairs - a lot of confidence, some confidence, not too much confidence, or no confidence at all?...Russian President Dmitry Medvedev.
raw_output:
I have limited confidence in Dmitry Medvedev's ability to do the right thing regarding world affairs, as he is no longer the President or Prime Minister of Russia and has generally kept a lower international profile compared to other leaders. This makes it difficult to trust him to influence global matters positively.

ANSWER: C
